text:
[Verse]
Dancing in the night
Stars shining so bright
We lose all our sight
It's a wild ride

[Verse 2]
Skipping down the lane
Feeling no more pain
Life is just a game
In the pouring rain

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight
Holding on so tight
Everything feels right
Dancing through the night

[Bridge]
Hearts are beating fast
Moments that will last
Forget about the past
Love is here at last

[Verse 3]
Whispers in my ear
Tell me what I hear
We have nothing to fear
When you are near

[Verse 4]
Step into the glow
Let the feeling flow
Magic starts to grow
As the moon hangs low
title: Under the Moonlight
